title: Analysis of Dollar Movement and Trade/Fiscal Policies
content:
The U.S. dollar fell against major currencies at the start of the week. This decline followed President Trump's announcement to double duties on imported steel and aluminum and tensions with China. China's Commerce Ministry called the accusations "groundless" and planned "forceful measures", although Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent expressed belief that issues would be "ironed out". The dollar dropped against the yen, while the euro and sterling gained. The Canadian dollar, despite the tariff announcement, reached an eight-month high against the U.S. dollar. A broader index measuring the greenback against six major peers also eased.

Some analysts suggest that U.S. protectionist trade policies increase the risk of stagflation, which could further weaken the dollar. The dollar has been significantly affected by Trump's trade policies and uncertainties. Concerns about a potential U.S. recession triggered by trade tensions have led investors to question the dollar's safe-haven status. The dollar had fallen against major peers since "Liberation Day" tariffs and further declined in the two weeks when 50% levies on Europe were threatened (though later postponed). It saw a brief rise after talks with the EU resumed and a court blocked some tariffs, but the duties were reinstated by an appeals court, and the administration indicated alternative implementation methods.

Goldman Sachs expects sectoral tariffs and at least a 10% tariff floor for major trading partners to remain. They noted a risk that if tariffs are hindered, attention might shift to other revenue methods, potentially more negative for the dollar.

Fiscal worries have also contributed to a "Sell America" trend, causing U.S. dollar assets like stocks and bonds to drop. These concerns are highlighted as the Senate considers a tax cut and spending bill that would add significantly to the national debt. A specific section, S899, could be crucial. Barclays analysts believe S899, which would allow taxing companies/investors from countries with "unfair foreign taxes," could be seen as a tax on the U.S. capital account. They suggest that actively reducing the return on foreigners' U.S. investments would likely decrease inflows and pressure the dollar.

Despite the dollar sentiment being near "extreme negativity," the future path is unclear. Other currencies like the Australian and New Zealand dollars also saw gains.

units.unit: at the start of the week

analysis.translatedSentenceText: 미국 달러는 주 초에 주요 통화들에 대해 하락했다.
analysis.originalSentenceText: The U.S. dollar fell against major currencies at the start of the week

units.unit: President Trump's announcement to double duties on imported steel and aluminum and tensions with China
units.detail: 트럼프 대통령의 수입 철강 및 알루미늄 관세 두 배 인상 발표와 중국과의 긴장

units.unit: to double duties on imported steel and aluminum
units.detail: 수입 철강 및 알루미늄에 대한 관세를 두 배로 올리겠다는

analysis.translatedSentenceText: 이러한 하락은 트럼프 대통령이 수입 철강 및 알루미늄에 대한 관세를 두 배로 올리겠다는 발표와 중국과의 긴장에 뒤따른 것이었다.
analysis.originalSentenceText: This decline followed President Trump's announcement to double duties on imported steel and aluminum and tensions with China

units.unit: although Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent expressed belief that issues would be "ironed out"

analysis.translatedSentenceText: 중국 상무부는 그 비난들이 "근거 없다"고 칭하며 "강력한 조치들"을 계획했지만, 스콧 베센트 재무장관은 문제들이 "해결될 것"이라는 믿음을 표명했다.
analysis.originalSentenceText: China's Commerce Ministry called the accusations "groundless"and planned "forceful measures" although Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent expressed belief that issues would be "ironed out"

units.unit: while the euro and sterling gained

analysis.translatedSentenceText: 달러는 엔화에 대해 하락한 반면, 유로화와 파운드화는 상승했다.
analysis.originalSentenceText: The dollar dropped against the yen while the euro and sterling gained

analysis.translatedSentenceText: 캐나다 달러는 관세 발표에도 불구하고 미국 달러 대비 8개월 만의 최고치에 도달했다.
analysis.originalSentenceText: The Canadian dollar despite the tariff announcement reached an eight-month high against the U.S. dollar

units.unit: A broader index measuring the greenback against six major peers
units.detail: 6개 주요 상대 통화에 대한 달러 가치를 측정하는 더 넓은 지수가

units.unit: measuring the greenback against six major peers
units.detail: 6개 주요 상대 통화에 대한 달러 가치를 측정하는

analysis.translatedSentenceText: 6개 주요 상대 통화에 대한 달러 가치를 측정하는 더 넓은 지수 또한 하락했다.
analysis.originalSentenceText: A broader index measuring the greenback against six major peers also eased

units.unit: that U.S. protectionist trade policies increase the risk of stagflation, which could further weaken the dollar
which could further weaken the dollar

analysis.translatedSentenceText: 일부 분석가들은 미국의 보호무역 정책이 스태그플레이션 위험을 증가시키며, 이는 달러를 더욱 약화시킬 수 있다고 시사한다.
analysis.originalSentenceText: Some analysts suggest that U.S. protectionist trade policies increase the risk of stagflation, which could further weaken the dollar

units.unit: by Trump's trade policies and uncertainties

analysis.translatedSentenceText: 달러는 트럼프의 무역 정책과 불확실성에 의해 상당히 영향을 받아왔다.
analysis.originalSentenceText: The dollar has been significantly affected by Trump's trade policies and uncertainties

units.unit: Concerns about a potential U.S. recession triggered by trade tensions
units.detail: 무역 긴장으로 촉발된 잠재적인 미국 경기 침체에 대한 우려가

units.unit: to question the dollar's safe-haven status

analysis.translatedSentenceText: 무역 긴장으로 촉발된 잠재적인 미국 경기 침체에 대한 우려로 인해 투자자들은 달러의 안전자산 지위에 의문을 제기하게 되었다.
analysis.originalSentenceText: Concerns about a potential U.S. recession triggered by trade tensions have led investors to question the dollar's safe-haven status

units.unit: when Trump threatened 50% levies on Europe and then postponed them
units.meaning: the last two weeks를 수식하는 관계부사절

analysis.translatedSentenceText: 달러는 "해방의 날" 관세 이후 주요 상대 통화들에 대해 하락했었고, 트럼프가 유럽에 50% 관세를 부과하겠다고 위협했다가 연기했던 지난 2주 동안 더욱 하락했다.
analysis.originalSentenceText: The dollar had fallen against major peers since "Liberation Day" tariffsand further declined in the last two weeks

units.unit: after talks with the European Union got back on track and a U.S. trade court blocked the bulk of Trump's tariffs on the grounds that he overstepped his authority
on the grounds that he overstepped his authority

analysis.translatedSentenceText: 지난주, 유럽 연합과의 회담이 정상 궤도에 오르고 미국 무역 법원이 트럼프가 권한을 남용했다는 이유로 그의 관세 대부분을 막은 후, 달러는 0.3% 상승하며 약간의 유예 기간을 얻었다.
analysis.originalSentenceText: Last week, the greenback got a bit of respite rising 0.3% after talks with the European Union got back on track and a U.S. trade court blocked the bulk of Trump's tariffs on the grounds that he overstepped his authority

units.unit: it had other avenues to implement the levies if it loses in court
it showed there were still checks in place on the president's power
there were still checks in place on the president's power

analysis.translatedSentenceText: 하루 뒤 항소 법원이 그 관세들을 복원시켰고, 트럼프 행정부는 법정에서 패소할 경우 관세를 시행할 다른 방안들이 있다고 말했지만, 많은 분석가들은 그것이 대통령의 권력에 대한 견제 장치가 여전히 존재함을 보여준다고 말했다.
analysis.originalSentenceText: An appeals court reinstated the duties a day laterand Trump's administration said it had other avenues to implement the levies if it loses in courtbut many analysts said it showed there were still checks in place on the president's power

units.unit: it expected the 10% tariff floor for major trading partners to remain, in addition to sectoral tariffs
the 10% tariff floor for major trading partners
units.detail: 주요 교역 상대국에 대한 10% 관세 하한선이

analysis.translatedSentenceText: 골드만삭스는 부문별 관세 외에도 주요 교역 상대국에 대한 10% 관세 하한선이 유지될 것으로 예상한다고 말했다.
analysis.originalSentenceText: Goldman Sachs said it expected the 10% tariff floor for major trading partners to remain, in addition to sectoral tariffs

units.unit: that if tariffs are impeded, attention may shift to other ways of raising revenues which may be even more negative for the dollar,"
to other ways of raising revenues
which may be even more negative for the dollar

analysis.translatedSentenceText: "만약 관세가 방해받으면, 관심이 달러에 훨씬 더 부정적일 수 있는 다른 세입 확보 방법으로 옮겨갈 수 있다는 위험은 남아있다"고 골드만 분석가들은 보고서에서 말했다.
analysis.originalSentenceText: "The risk remains that if tariffs are impeded, attention may shift to other ways of raising revenues which may be even more negative for the dollar," Goldman analysts said in a note

units.unit: that has seen dollar assets from stocks to Treasury bonds dropping in recent months
dollar assets from stocks to Treasury bonds

units.detail: 최근 몇 달 동안 하락하는 것을

analysis.translatedSentenceText: 재정적 우려 또한 최근 몇 달 동안 주식에서 국채에 이르는 달러 자산이 하락하는 것을 보아온 광범위한 "미국 자산 매도" 분위기를 야기해왔다.
analysis.originalSentenceText: Fiscal worries have also given rise to a broad "Sell America" theme

units.unit: as the Senate starts considering Trump's sweeping tax cut and spending bill,
considering Trump's sweeping tax cut and spending bill
units.detail: 트럼프의 대규모 세금 감면 및 지출 법안 심의를

units.unit: which will add an estimated $3.8 trillion to the federal government's $36.2 trillion in debt over the next decade
to the federal government's $36.2 trillion in debt

analysis.translatedSentenceText: 상원이 향후 10년간 연방 정부 부채 36조 2천억 달러에 약 3조 8천억 달러를 추가할 트럼프의 대규모 세금 감면 및 지출 법안 심의를 시작함에 따라, 그러한 우려들은 이번 주에 특히 주목받는다.
analysis.originalSentenceText: Those concerns come into particular focus this week as the Senate starts considering Trump's sweeping tax cut and spending bill,

units.unit: the bill will need major revisions

analysis.translatedSentenceText: 많은 상원의원들은 이미 그 법안이 대대적인 수정이 필요할 것이라고 말했고, 트럼프는 그가 변경을 환영한다고 말했다.
analysis.originalSentenceText: Many senators have already said the bill will need major revisionsand Trump said he welcomed changes

units.unit: The fate of section 899 of the bill

analysis.translatedSentenceText: 바클레이즈 분석가들에 따르면, 그 법안의 899조의 운명은 중요할 수 있다.
analysis.originalSentenceText: The fate of section 899 of the bill could be crucial according to Barclays analysts

units.unit: to tax companies and investors from countries deemed to have 'unfair foreign taxes'
units.detail: '불공정한 해외 세금'을 가진 것으로 간주되는 국가의 기업과 투자자에게 세금을 부과할

units.unit: as a tax on the U.S. capital account
at a time when investor nervousness towards U.S. assets has grown,"

analysis.translatedSentenceText: "S899조는 미국에게 '불공정한 해외 세금'을 가진 것으로 간주되는 국가의 기업과 투자자에게 세금을 부과할 자유재량권을 줄 것이며, 미국 자산에 대한 투자자들의 불안감이 커진 시기에 미국 자본 계정에 대한 세금으로 간주될 수 있다"고 그들은 연구 보고서에서 말했다.
analysis.originalSentenceText: "S899 would give the U.S. free rein(and) could be seen as a tax on the U.S. capital account at a time when investor nervousness towards U.S. assets has grown," they said in a research report

units.unit: "Actively reducing foreigners' total return on their U.S. investments
units.detail: 외국인들의 미국 투자 총수익을 적극적으로 줄이는 것은

units.unit: foreigners' total return on their U.S. investments

analysis.translatedSentenceText: "다른 모든 조건이 같다면, 외국인들의 미국 투자 총수익을 적극적으로 줄이는 것은 자금 유입을 손상시키고 달러에 부담을 줄 것"이라고 바클레이즈 분석가들은 말했다.
analysis.originalSentenceText: "Actively reducing foreigners' total return on their U.S. investments would dent inflowsand weigh on the dollar, all else equal," Barclays analysts said

units.unit: "While dollar sentiment/positioning remains close to extreme negativity,

analysis.translatedSentenceText: "달러 심리/포지셔닝이 극단적인 부정에 가깝게 유지되고 있지만, 앞으로의 경로는 결코 명확하지 않다."
analysis.originalSentenceText: "While dollar sentiment/positioning remains close to extreme negativity, the path ahead is by no means clear cut."

analysis.translatedSentenceText: 다른 곳에서는, 호주 달러는 0.70% 상승하여 0.64달러가 되었고 뉴질랜드 달러는 0.85% 상승하여 0.60달러가 되었다.
analysis.originalSentenceText: Elsewhere, the Australian dollar added 0.70% to $0.64and the New Zealand dollar rose 0.85% to $0.60.

vocabulary.meaning: "해방의 날" 관세 (문맥상 특정 관세 조치를 지칭)

vocabulary.word: sweeping tax cut and spending bill
vocabulary.meaning: 대규모 세금 감면 및 지출 법안
